frontmatter.name: Benedicte Raae
frontmatter.title: A privacy first period tracker? Is it even possible?
frontmatter.bio: Benedicte Raae is a independent contractor, working as a full stack developer. With a developer mom she had free access to Internet from an early age, but it was actually her Norwegian teacher that introduced her to HTML in 1997. Since then, she has created countless apps, services and sites. Both for fun and profit.
